DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: Arco Will Slow Its Oil Hunt in Alaska in 1994 : Atlantic Richfield Co. ' s $ 1.9-billion capital spending budget_for the new year reflects a decline in the amount_of_money set_aside for petroleum exploration in Alaska , where the company produces two-thirds of its oil.In 1993 , Arco spent $ 415 million drilling wells to evaluate earlier discoveries at Kuvlum , on the North Slope , and at the Sunfish site in Cook Inlet . Both areas yielded disappointing results . This year , Arco will spend $ 300 million to drill_in the state .
